title: Tim Heidecker and Gregg Turkington Predict the Oscar Winners
text: In addition to starring in the new movie Mister America, Tim Heidecker and Gregg Turkington are the masterminds behind the long-running film-review series On Cinema at the Cinema. So with the Academy Awards just a few months away, we recently sat down with Heidecker and Turkington to put their film expertise to work. We gave them a list of movies from 2019, pairing them up for the sake of debate, and asked the duo to give their predictions for the films that will score a coveted Best Picture nomination. Which movies do Tim and Gregg think will win Oscar gold? See their picks for yourself above.
description: On Cinema’s Tim Heidecker and Gregg Turkington predict which movies will win big at this year’s academy awards.
